[color=#FFFFE0][b]Auto-close thread limit increased[/b][/color]
On 9th February, our administrator [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] posted a thread stating that he has increased the Auto-close thread limit from 2.000 replies to 2.500 replies. You can read more about it here.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5547228]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=#FFFFE0][b]Bitcoin value changing rapidly[/b][/color]
For a few months now bitcoin has been rising in value and having an occasional fallback. This week has been no different with bitcoin surpassing the $1.000,- a coin mark yet again. As of today bitcoin's worth is a little below $1.000,- again but the future of the coin looks promising.[i][size=x-small][url=https://bitcointalk.org/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5547228][b]Auto-Close Threads[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
The auto-close limit on threads has been extended from 2,000 to 2,500 posts.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5548803][b]Open Personal Notepad as popup on all pages[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2219785][b][color=white]Cammy[/color][/b][/url]
Cammy created an  user script to open your personal Hack Forums notepad as a popup so you can use it anytime outside of your UserCP.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5547271][b][Guide] How to protect yourself from crappy products on Amazon.[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2648908][b][color=#99FF00]CanisMajoris[/color][/b][/url]
An excellent guide is written up to hopefully help prevent you from buying any cheap or bad quality products on Amazon.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5548882][b]Lesson 1: Basics of networking[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3449450][b][color=#99FF00]whiteSEC[/color][/b][/url]
Have an interest in Networking? Now you have an opportunity to gain some basic knowledge.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5549601][b]Lesson 2: Application layer[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3449450][b][color=#99FF00]whiteSEC[/color][/b][/url]
Continuation of his first thread, whiteSEC has created another lesson but this time on application layers.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5549095][b]how To Make Bot For Check list[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3324493][b][color=#99FF00]SharoKudi[/color][/b][/url]
If coding is something you like to do, and you always wanted to make a program to a checklist, you can learn from here.

If we missed your thread this edition, please report it in our [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5470739]Weekly Reports[/url] thread![/list][/list]

[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5542550][b]Post what you are listening to[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2076118][b][color=#99FF00]snailgolfer[/color][/b][/url]

What is your opinion on kissing on the first date? Too soon? Do you think you should give it some time? Share your opinion!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5540446][b]What kind of milk do you purchase?[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3318894][b][color=#00AAFF]Attach[/color][/b][/url]
Milk fanatics, post what your favorite type of milk is. Do you go for the slim? Whole? Attach is curious to know![/list][/list]

[list]

No feedback threads this week. Again. :c[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5548393][b]Get Your Name On Microsoft's Security Hall Of Fame[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2466948][b][color=#99FF00]User1999[/color][/b][/url]
A pretty rad giveaway by the member User1999. Giving away a chance to get your name on the Microsoft Hall of Fame. Think you have the luck to win a spot?

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5544398][b][ALL MEMBERS] RUST GIVEAWAY // STEAM !![/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2714148][b][color=white]๖ۣۜDominate[/color][/b][/url]
Any gamers out there? Ever wanted to play Rust? PC players come and join this contest for a chance to win a copy of the game!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5538964][b]Free Teamspeak hosting![/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1755563][b][color=#99FF00]Thalothas[/color][/b][/url]
Free for all, if you would like to get some free Teamspeak hosting, Thalothas has the hookup.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5546072][b]Longest yeee boi gets a free NanoCore license.[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1769039][b][color=white]{nexus}[/color][/b][/url]

[list][b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[hr]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Interview/330.png[/img]
[color=1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501]Roger Waters[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: Hello Roger Waters, how are you?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: Yes hello Hydra I am doing well this evening, thanks for having me.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: Thank you. I don't recall the HF News team ever interviewing an ex-HF member so this is already off to a great start. You should feel really special. So, let's get started with the goodies. The question I'm sure we're all wanting know is: How is life without Hack Forums?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: It's great. You never realize how much time you spend on there until you're gone. It's refreshing to be doing other things, like focusing on schoolwork and learning a few coding languages.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: That's good to hear. Glad everything is going well for you. So, we know you're enjoying life but do you have any regrets for leaving Hack Forums?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: There are times when I catch myself typing in Hack Forums when I have nothing else to do. At times I miss having access to somethings the site had to offer. I also miss some of the friends I've made. But as for closing my account and leaving, that was something I just had to do and is something I don't have regrets about.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: We all have to move places in life and let go of other things so it's going to be well worth it. We recently got another group added to Hack Forums named Genesis and will be a cryptocurrency group; it is led by DevNet. I'd like to get some input from you about that. What were a few things during your stay on Hack Forums that you enjoyed or disliked about the groups?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: Hmm, another Crypto Currency group? I believe HF has had a few of those before and they didn't last long. Not to say anything bad about a group I know nothing about, they'll need to do something different. Out of the groups that were crypto currency based, we never saw one create their own altcoin. If they create one and get it integrated with the site as a solid replacement to Omnicoin, I can see that group taking off. As for groups during my time on HF, I really enjoyed the groups that were like a family. Everyone knew each other and got along (for the most part), like the Empire once was and how the Brotherhood was when I ran it. The one thing I disliked most about groups was when owners stopped being active, sold leadership slots, and overall didn't care much about the group and didn't care about the direction they were going in.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: Quite interesting and I know many would agree with you on that. So before we end the interview, a couple last questions. With your many years on Hack Forums, what advice would you give new members?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: Don't rush your experience on HF. Throughout the years I've seen people make goals for themselves, like becoming l33t or ub3r by a certain date or becoming a group member, leader, or owner by another date. Those goals never work out and the members end up closed or hated by members of the community by trying too hard. Just make the best of your experiences and everything will turn out just fine.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: Very true, I've seen this happen to many as well. Final question, let's talk politics. Do you reside in the U.S. and what do you think of having Donald Trump as the president?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: I think he is the change this country needs. I expect him to deliver just about every promise he's made to the American voter and by the end of his presidency, we'll be in a better state than what it was when he came into office. I think a lot of good change is still to come.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#ff3554][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url]: Alright, well that is all for the interview. Big thanks from Hack Forums, HF News Team, and myself. Keep up the good work in life and continuing moving forward Roger Waters! Wish you the very best. Cya'
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#9aff2b][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]: Thanks for having me.

[/align][/spoiler][/align]
 
[hr]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/ScienceNews/ryand8_SN.png[/img][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]First Human-Animal Chimera[/b][/color]
In an extremely controversial feat, scientists have managed to create the world's first human-pig chimera. By injecting a pig embryo with human cells early in its development, not only did the embryos survive after being introduced with the cells, but continued growing 4 weeks before it was removed and analyzed. Steps towards creating this chimera began after scientists were successfully able to grow mouse pancreases in rats in an attempt to treat diabetes, which was successful. This represents the first steps to being able to lab grow organs in an attempt to relieve the high-demand of organs across the country. [size=x-small][url=http://news.nationalgeographic.com/2017/01/human-pig-hybrid-embryo-chimera-organs-health-science/]>>Source[/url][/size]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Tornados with Attitude[/b][/color]
Tornado clusters have been found to have a little more 'umph' than the previous years and are still continuing to grow. The number of tornado outbreaks per year has remained constant; however, the size, duration and number of tornados per outbreak has been increasing drasitically and no exact cause has been reported. Thought to be a by-product of climate change, studies showed that "meteorlogical factors did not have the expected signature of climate change". The drastic change over the years begs the question as to what the real cause of these changes are. Either there are other factors causing the changes or there are large implications of climate change that scients have yet to realize. [url=http://www.livescience.com/57077-extreme-tornado-clusters-are-increasing.html][size=x-small]>>Source[/size][/url]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]New Battery Could Run Over a Decade[/b][/color]
With lithium ion batteries being the current standard for production batteries, scientists at Harvard may have realized a new flow battery to not only increase the battery output, but that only loses one percent of its capacity per 1000 cycles. "Lithium ion batteries don't even survive 1000 complete charge/discharge cycles". This new means of technology portrays significant improvements in production costing less than $100 per kilowatt-hour. By understanding what was happening to the degradation of batteries at the molecular level, scientiests were able to pinpoint Ferrocene as the culprit. Previously able to store charge, but insoluble -- scientists managed to functionalize Ferrocene molecules and turn it into a "highly soluble one that could be cycled stably".   [url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2017/02/170209163838.htm][size=x-small]>>Source[/size][/url]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Wikipedia Bans the Daily Mail as a Source on its Website[/color][/b]
Links to [i]Daily Mail[/i] will no longer be allowed in citations on Wikipedia due to concerns of reliability. [i]Daily Mail[/i] is criticized of poor fact checking, sensationalism, and flat-out fabrication. A debate took place over the source’s legitimacy on Wikipedia, but a consensus eventually developed supporting those in favor of the ban. Critics of the ban believe the blanket ban will cause for some poorer-quality substitutions. Regardless, Wikipedia has requested that volunteer editors begin searching for citations with [i]Daily Mail[/i] links and replacing any that are found.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/gadgets-and-tech/wikipedia-editors-ban-daily-mail-source-citation-unreliable-mail-online-a7570856.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]U.S. Ambassador Says Sanctions on Russia Will not be Lifted[/color][/b]
The new U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, Nikki Haley, has expressed her condemnation of Russia’s actions in eastern Ukraine. Until Crimea is returned to Kyiv, Haley expressed that sanctions against Russia will not be lifted. Although the ambassador wants better relations with Russia, she believes the actions in Ukraine cannot go without consequence. Russia took control of Crimea is 2014, but Ukraine and 99 other countries in the UN view the seizure as illegitimate. These remarks were Haley’s first before the UN Security Council since being sworn into office.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.rferl.org/a/ukraine-un-ambassador-haley-condemns-russia/28275953.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]South Sudan President Says Soldiers who Rape Deserve to be Shot[/color][/b]
In response to citizen outrage over abuses by security forces, the president of South Sudan said soldiers who rape civilians should be shot. South Sudan has been in a civil war since 2013, and soldiers from both sides have been reported of committing acts of rape. The UN and other rights groups have reported that gang-rape is occurring against women based on their ethnicity. These reports of sexual violence have raised tensions between the South Sudanese government and its Western donors. The Western donors fund much of the country’s health needs, education needs, and its 15,000-strong U.N. peacekeeping force, so the need to ease tensions is very crucial for South Sudan. Overall, the civil war has caused more than three million people to flee their homes.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.reuters.com/article/us-southsudan-war-idUSKBN15L1R4] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews/Gladly.png[/img][/align]
[align=left]

[url=http://www.digitaltrends.com/cool-tech/fret-zeppelin-teaches-guitar/][b]Fret Zeppelin Guitar Attachment Teaches Guitar With LEDs[/b][/url]
Back in the day, most young adults have played the world-famous Guitar Hero, or at least heard of it. A Kickstarter project led by Shaun Masavage wants to introduce the world to a way to learn how to play the guitar in a similar fashion. The Fret Zeppelin is a smart attachment that goes right onto a users' guitar, and utilizes LED lights to show what chord to play next. The device will sync up to a selected song, and display where to fret next. Masavage says his team is composed of many with experience in learning guitar and even music theory, and that they have designed the Fret Zeppelin to work with all levels of guitar players, whether it be a brand new player, an intermediate, or even advanced level guitar players. The attachment will go on sale for $199 if the Kickstarter campaign is successful, and Kickstarter pre-orders will ship this October.

[url=http://www.theverge.com/2017/2/9/14549786/drone-bees-artificial-pollinators-colony-collapse-disorder][b]Japanese Researchers Create Robot Bee to Pollinate Plants [/b][/url]
A big concern in the scientific community is the fear of bees soon disappearing. To combat this, a group of Japanese researchers are working on robotic bees, to help out the diminishing bee population and pollinate plants. Researcher Eijiro Miyako and his team have created an "artificial bee", using a very tiny drone, capable of pollination thanks to animal hair and a special gel that helps the drones carry and release the pollen. The robots are still being tested and researched in labs, but may see use in the outdoors sometime in the future. The drones were showcased alongside a published study in scientific journal Chem.
[/align]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Destiny 2 Confirmed for 2017[/color][/b] 
The developers at Activision and Bungie are happy to announce the awaited sequel of the popular online first-person shooter game Destiny will be getting a sequel. This is no news, but the release date was unknown prior to the announcement. It has been confirmed that the game will be released this year. Is is not 100% confirmed the actual date of release, but it will approximately be available this autumn. Will this edition of the game have as many DLC offerings that the original game had? Not much else is known about the game. [i][size=x-small] [url=http://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2017/02/10/destiny-2-is-coming-out-this-year-or-else/#327389e36c5f]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Call of Duty Back to Its Roots?[/color][/b] 
Some juicy news for players who miss what Call of Duty used to be like. For the past few years with the release of the recent Call of Duty games, many players have complained about the futuristic combat. Some CoD fans even mocked the futuristic warfare by stating, "they thought they were supposed to be playing CoD, not Halo". Charlie Intel has gotten some great news for CoD fans. The next upcoming Call of Duty will be by Sledgehammer Games this year. During Activision Blizzard's Q4 Earnings Call, COO Thomas Tippl had said, "take Call of Duty back to its roots." Furthermore, Tippl stated, "traditional combat will once again take center stage." A YouTuber by the name of "Eight Thoughts", known for making videos normally targetting other members of the Call of Duty community has mentioned countless times (If you have watched his videos) that Call of Duty does not listen to their fans. Well, they finally did. Will Sledgehammer really bring CoD back to its roots? Will the infamous supply drops make a return as well? [i][size=x-small] [url=http://charlieintel.com/2017/02/09/activision-officially-confirms-call-duty-2017-will-take-call-duty-back-roots/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Gears Of War 4 Celebrates Valentine's Day With Cupid's Torque Bow Mode[/color][/b] 
What a better way to celebrate Valentine's Day than to blow up someone's body? Well, Gears of War 4 has that craving just for you! Currently live now until Feb. 20, GoW 4 players have the chance to participate in a new event. Inside the event, players will be given the "Cupid Torque Bow." From there, players will get to have a fun little match with the special Torque Bow that they have been given. The bow is special because when a user is tagged by an arrow, it will explode with a wonderful little heart! What is even more special is the design of the bow which is a nice pink heart. Why not play this gamemode with your significant other? Sounds like an interesting date! [i][size=x-small] [url=http://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2017/02/10/destiny-2-is-coming-out-this-year-or-else/#327389e36c5f]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]NieR: Automata Controversy + New Trailer[/color][/b] 
Nier: Automata is an upcoming role-playing game that will be released on Feb. 23 of this year. The game has created a lot of controversy due to the provocative clothing that the main character wears. If you take the time to do some research, then people can find out there have already been many fan art images created of the main character, 2B, and her flashy bottom. Of course character appeal will draw in attention whether it be in a positive way or negative. The game made its announcement last year at gaming convention E3, and since has struck a lot of popularity. The demo was shorter than most of the games being showcased to the public. The estimated time was around half-an-hour of demo gameplay. That video can be seen [url=https://youtu.be/yJ0hAvpJc7I]here[/url]. At first glance, the game has a Metal Gear Solid style of gameplay. The newer versions of MGS, of course. The game developers behind the game, Square Enix, have recently dropped a new two minute trailer on YouTube titled, "Glory to Mankind 119450310". That trailer can be found [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eLZGZmqK00k]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=http://kotaku.com/nier-designer-butts-in-regarding-cheeky-controversy-1790967094]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Xbox One Will Now Play Grand Theft Auto IV[/color][/b] 
"Hey, Niko! It's your cousin, Roman! Do you want to go bowling?" Looking for a little bit of nostalgia? Then here is some news that will definitely knock your socks off. Grand Theft Auto 4 is now compatible on the Xbox One system. If you are getting a little bit board of GTA 5, then why not go back to playing Niko? Take a stroll down memory lane in Liberty City and bask in the glory that is Grand Theft Auto. In order to play the game you will be required to have a physical copy of the Grand Theft Auto 4 disk or download the digital version from the store. If you have purchased the game in the past digitally rather than physically, you should have the option to re-download the game for the One. If you have neither copy of the game, you can purchase it online for $20. In addition to being able to play this awesome game on the new gen consoles is that you can also import your old 360 save of GTA 4 to your Xbox One storage device. In order to do this, one must upload the Xbox 360 version of their save to the cloud. From there, the user will be able to transfer it over to the One and continue where they left off. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.techradar.com/news/lets-go-bowling-xbox-one-will-now-play-grand-theft-auto-iv]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Konami's New Bomberman Spinoff Bombergirl[/color][/b] 
With the upcoming release of the new Nintendo Switch, many new Nintendo games are in the works. One of those new games is a spinoff of the popular game that was released way back in the 80's, Bomberman. Konami has planned to release new game, Super Bomberman R, the latest in the Bomberman series. This game will be in March, just like the Switch. Not only is Konami making Super Bomberman R, they are also making a spinoff titled, "Bombergirl". This cute little game is filled with magnificent anime-style art but the gameplay has a twist. Polygon states, "It’s called Bombergirl, and it’s like regular Bomberman, but with a twist: What if Bomberman was ... horny?" In its current state, it is a arcade game only. You remember those style of games, right? No, like the real arcade style games. The only way to play this game at the current time is on a real arcade machine! Up to four players can battle it out in the arena, controlling what seems to be one of 15 (possibly 15) available characters. What happens if you lose? Well, that is where the "horny" part of the game comes in. The losers characters will end up having their clothing ripped off exposing their breasts. As of right now, there is no information on whether or not they are censored or not. But is that really important?! If you would like to see pictures (not of the breasts, silly), you can [url=https://twitter.com/KONAMI573ch/status/829887659279409152]here[/url] & [url=https://i.imgur.com/FrG8XGD.jpg]here[/url]! In addition to the pictures, the video can be found at [url=https://youtu.be/6ucmIO6hC5I]this[/url] link. Definitely something to look at if this style of art is up your alley. The characters have a "chibi" character style. Chibi is Japanese slang for "short" or "small".  Possibly a new addicting game for the anime fans of the world? There has been no announcement on when this spinoff will be released. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.polygon.com/2017/2/10/14571826/bombergirl-arcade-konami-bomberman-anime]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
